name: Sebastian Risi
content: Sebastian Risi - IT-University of Copenhagen Sebastian Risi public CV Sebastian Risi Professor, Play, Culture, and AIHead of Research Group, Creative AI LabMachine LearningRobotics, Evolution, and Art LabREAL Lab https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3607-8400 Emailsebritudk 20072024 Research activity per year Personal profile CurriculumSebastian Risi is a Professor at the IT University of Copenhagen. He received a diploma in computer science from the Philipps University of Marburg, Germany in 2007 and received a PhD in 2012 from the University of Central Florida. Before joining the IT University he was a postdoctoral DAAD fellow at Cornell University working with Hod Lipson. More information can be found here: sebastianrisi.com and full CV here.
